prompt: Search the client's previous automotive inbound call where they scheduled an oil change and tire rotation for their vehicle.
Locate the inbound call where the customer asked whether their extended warranty would cover a brake inspection on their car.
Find the earlier automotive inbound conversation where the client reported a check-engine light and booked a diagnostic appointment.
Retrieve the inbound call where the caller confirmed Saturday service hours before bringing in their truck for maintenance.
Search past automotive inbound calls for the transcript where the customer asked about pricing for a full vehicle inspection before a road trip.
Locate the earlier call where the client requested to reschedule their routine service appointment for their car.
Find the automotive inbound call in which the customer updated their phone number while booking a warranty inspection.
Retrieve the transcript of the inbound call where the caller asked if the dealership could provide a loaner vehicle during repairs.
Search prior automotive inbound calls for the one where the client inquired about towing their disabled car to the service center.
Locate the previous inbound call where the customer asked for the service history of their vehicle before deciding on new work.
Find the earlier conversation where the customer complained that their daily driver made a grinding noise when slowing down and asked for a check-up.
Search past calls for the chat where the caller wanted the shop to swap out the rubber on all four corners before a long highway vacation.
Locate the transcript where someone asked whether their protection plan still applied after a minor fender-bender.
Retrieve the prior call where the client asked if they could wait on-site while their ride was being looked over.
Search previous conversations for the one where a caller wanted to move an already booked check-up from the morning to a late-afternoon slot.
Find the call in which the customer asked which fluids would be checked during their upcoming visit and how long the appointment would take.
Locate the earlier conversation where a client asked for a ballpark figure to fix a vibration in the steering wheel at higher speeds.
Retrieve the past call where someone asked whether they should bring paperwork from the finance company when dropping off their SUV.
Search prior conversations for the transcript where the caller asked if roadside assistance through the store could pick up their broken-down ride.
Find the earlier call where a customer asked whether a noise in the front end needed immediate attention or could wait until the next scheduled visit.
